location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from William Bruce, Resident, Bushire, to Captain Gray, Commanding at Rassulkhyma [Ra's al-Khaymah]

mods.abstract: In this letter, William Bruce, Resident at Bushire, informs Gray that the HC dow [dhow] Nimrodhas been provided with supplies for the garrison at Rasselkhyma [Ra's al-Khaymah]. Bruce states that he has given the Commander of the Nimrod,Lieutenant William MacDonald, an advance of 300 Spanish dollars.
